name: BBQ Chicken Pizza Night with Coleslaw and Sweet Corn
description: Family-friendly heat-and-eat dinner: warm BBQ chicken pizzas with chilled coleslaw and quick microwave sweet corn, plus fresh grapes on the side. Zero chili heat and ready in minutes.
prep_steps: If using an oven, preheat to 220°C/425°F (optional; microwave works too).
If corn is canned, drain; if frozen, measure straight from bag.
cook_steps: Heat bbq chicken pizza: Microwave 1 pizza on a microwave-safe plate for 3–5 minutes until hot (or bake 10–12 minutes if using oven and time allows). Repeat for the second pizza if needed.
Warm corn: Place corn in a microwave-safe bowl with 2 tablespoons water, cover, and microwave 2–3 minutes; drain any liquid and season lightly with salt if desired.
Open coleslaw and give it a quick stir.
Slice pizzas, then plate with a scoop of coleslaw, a serving of sweet corn, and a handful of grapes for each person.
